= Server wide module Configuration

This config section convert environment variable related to server wide module configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/wide_modules.adoc[]


[[option_server_wide_modules]]
== server_wide_modules
NOTE: list of server-wide modules.

Odoo cli used:

* --load

The environment variable `LOAD` is xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_repeatable[repeatable]. +
This mean a suffix can be added after an **single** `_`.
For example `LOAD_value`, the suffix is `value` not `_value`




== Other environment keys



[[env_SERVER_WIDE_MODULES]]
=== SERVER_WIDE_MODULES
old version of the list of the server-wide modules

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `SERVER_WIDE_MODULES` is used and expect a `set`.

NOTE: No cli argument exist for this key
